hooks.command: bash -c 'CMD=$(jq -r .tool_input.command); if echo "$CMD" | grep -qE "rm -rf|drop table|truncate|format"; then jq -n "{hookSpecificOutput:{hookEventName:\"PreToolUse\",permissionDecision:\"deny\",permissionDecisionReason:\"Destructive command blocked\"}}"; else exit 0; fi'

bash -c 'CMD=$(jq -r .tool_input.command); if echo "$CMD" | grep -q "git commit"; then cd /mnt/c/Users/User/Desktop/Projects/telegram-crm-client && npx eslint . --quiet 2>&1 | tail -5; if [ ${PIPESTATUS[0]} -ne 0 ]; then jq -n "{hookSpecificOutput:{hookEventName:\"PreToolUse\",permissionDecision:\"deny\",permissionDecisionReason:\"Lint errors must be fixed before commit\"}}"; else exit 0; fi; else exit 0; fi'

bash -c 'FILE=$(jq -r .tool_input.file_path // .tool_input.path); if echo "$FILE" | grep -qE "\.(ts|tsx|js|jsx)$"; then cd /mnt/c/Users/User/Desktop/Projects/telegram-crm-client && npx prettier --write "$FILE" 2>/dev/null || true; fi'
